Gets the data related to the booking the cleaner is assigned in agreements triggered OnCleanerAssign.
The id required is for the ClientCleanerRequest entity which has specific data like start hour.

Get all cleaners assigned to the booking given by its Id.

parameters.description: The message to send, it contains the Conversation Sid to send the message in and the body of the message.

get.summary:
Get cleaner unavailable hours. The values returned represent
what hours under a week day the cleaner is unavailable.

parameters.description: The cleaner id to get availability.

parameters.name: cleanerId
parameters.description: The cleaner id to update availability for.

parameters.name: cleanerUnavailableHours
parameters.description: The unavailable hours under a week day.

parameters.description: The cleaner id to retrieve the list from.

parameters.description: The cleaner id for which creating the exception.

parameters.name: cleanerId
parameters.description: The cleaner id for which to update the exception.

parameters.description: The new data to update the exception.

parameters.name: cleanerId
parameters.description: The cleaner id for which remove the exception.

parameters.name: exceptionId
parameters.description: The exception id to be removed.

get.summary:
Gets the cleaner net availability which checks for Gross Availability +
Exception Availability and conflicts with already booked events.

parameters.name: cleanerId
parameters.description: The cleaner id for which to get the net availability.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Formatted date (yyyy-mm-dd) to start looking for availability.

parameters.name: startHour
parameters.description: The starting hour to start searching.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in hours of the searching range for availability.

post.summary:
Gets cleaners net availability which checks for Gross Availability +
Exception Availability and conflicts with already booked events given a list of
restriction set from a request (which implicitly has the cleaners Id).

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A list of set of restrictions (dates) to find out availability.

post.summary:
Gets cleaner net availability which checks for Gross Availability +
Exception Availability and conflicts with already booked events given a
restriction set from a request (which implicitly has the cleaner Id).

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A set of restrictions (dates) to find out availability.
